name: Photodreamz
overview:
Vancouver Photographer, Jonah Lewis. I shoot Events, Po trait, and Scenic Photography in Vancouver, B.C. I’ve been a photographer for 20+ years and only recently decided to try and make a living at it.

I have formal training in photography and can shoot in all types of situations. Low lighting, indoor, outdoor are my specialty. If your going to hire a photographer, hire someone who’s passionate about it as an art form. It reflects in their work.

I take responsibility for what I shoot. I frame my subjects and consider the environment they are in.
